fda_announcement: The FDA is aware of emerging shortages and encourages manufacturers and healthcare providers to report inventory levels and challenges in real-time to facilitate better coordination.

The FDA is aware of a current shortage in the market. We are actively engaging with manufacturers to address supply disruptions. Stakeholders are encouraged to coordinate closely and report any significant supply changes. Patient safety remains our top priority.

The FDA is aware of emerging shortages in the market and encourages manufacturers to report production capacities and plans. Buyers should consider patient needs and avoid stockpiling to prevent exacerbating the shortage.
